official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act to permit volunteers aged 55 or older to serve without regard to the five year limitation on service.

summary.text: Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act to permit volunteers aged 55 or older to serve without regard to the five year limitation on service.
